nodes.text: Lifting claws were a type of devise used to move cargo from place to place within buildings. They were often employed in docking bays, and could be used to store various starfighters. Certain examples ran on straight tracks mounted high on walls, while others were fixed in position. They were imployed in Kaerobani's base in 10 ABY, as well as his orbiting shipyards and the New Republic base on Altyr V. Smaller versions were installed on Telgorn Corporation's Mark VI Powersuit, and Serv-O-Droid, Inc.'s DC5-1 freight droid.
